alliances: The Followers of the Left Hand Path
description: This article is about the occultist Morning Star.  For the Russian superhero from Marvel Comics, see Morningstar (comics).Morning Star is the alias of Schuyler Belial, a fictional Marvel Comics villain and Satanist who was an enemy of Moon Knight and the Werewolf by Night.  He first appeared in Moon Knight, Volume 1 #29.  He was created by Doug Moench and Bill Sienkiewicz.
name: Morning Star
